# Christy - UX Design Development & Integration Case Study

Christy is a Europe-based Home Decore B2C Business. At Krish Technolabs, we help them with UX Design Development & Integration Growth Support and consulting.


Back To Work Europe Solution B2C SERVICES Consulting & UX DesignDevelopment & IntegrationGrowth Support INDUSTRY Home Decor 44% Increase in Avg. Time on Page 34% Boost In Performance 26% Decrease in Bounce Rate Amplified Shopping Experience for Christy England Spinning The Yarn Of The British Linen Connoisseur With Well-combed eCommerce Solutions From Mr. Henry Christy’s visit to Constantinople, Christy England got its inspiration from the Turkish towels and started with a mill to produce something similar. As years passed, Christy’s towels were highly acclaimed by her Majesty Queen Victoria as she saw them in the Great Exhibition of 2021. The rest is history. Christy is England's leading supplier of branded and private-label towels and sells high-quality linen products. The company supplies to a wide range of retailers in the UK and overseas and has 70 standalone stores and 40+ shop-in-shop formats across the UK. They sought strategic directions from Krish and came into a collaboration to unify user experiences and streamline workflows with omnichannel digital commerce functionalities. Very subtle, still it weaves a better story Anonymous Challenges Combing Out The Problems Difficulty in streamlining workload Offering uniform user experience Facilitating implementation & integration with new digital commerce features Slow website load speed Stagnant / Slow conversions SEO practices to upscale Enhancing the marketing and store performance capacities with improved platform functionalities Solution Weaving For Perfection Christy England’s first aim behind collaborating with Krish was to practice ﬂexibility to showcase the amazing designs and styles they offer to the market. After overcoming the barriers of erratic business processes, team Krish leveraged the latest version of Magento Open Source to weave a solution that could accommodate connected shopping experiences via omnichannel features.With an altogether new and revamped UI/UX design, Krish helped the linen producer to streamline its third-party services, including shipping, payment, and sales tracking integrations. With an aim to become a high-performing digital commerce platform, Christy wished to leverage our seamless managed support services. The Strategy Reeling In The Actionable Fibres Christy England wanted to offer users a fresh, new perspective with its striking user interface. Krish carved out a strategy to optimize their UI/UX inside out and helped beautify multiple customer-facing facets. With a razor-sharp focus on enhancing the CX, digital commerce experts from Krish implemented multiple strategies, such as personalized product customization with the ‘look and feel’ features, shop-by-look functionalities, Trust Pilot review integration, and Klevu implementation for a smart product search. Once their onboarding CX was revamped, Krish focused on the most critical stages of the shopping experience - order processing, inventory management, shipping, and payment gateways. First, the experts at Krish developed a custom application to sync data with the ERP system for order and inventory management. Moreover, we also helped Christy England by offering a one-step checkout process by integrating major payment gateways. Then came the last step of shipping and delivery. Our experts leveraged the Evri parcel shop to offer store pick-up and next-day delivery customization options as a shipping method. Technology Mobile First Design Understood the vision and delivered on a truly on-brand experience. Client Speaks Debasish Saha CIO "Team Krish did an excellent job in helping us revive our brand image by fixing our overall UI/UX. We appreciate the efforts taken by team to patiently listen and identify the bottlenecks while charting out the strategies. The hard work has worked well in our favor to deliver an exceptional, much better CX to our clients." Result From Fibre To Fabric This distinctive collab of Krish x Christy England was more like a stepping stone toward enhancing the British linen producer’s online presence. With the bright minds of Krish at work, Christy is successfully running to offer its customers an unforgettable online shopping experience. There is a significant increase of 44% in their average time on page and a 34% boost in performance. This opens up multiple channels of growth for the company and to focus better on its key business objectives. Get in Touch Next Case Study Creating digital benchmarks for the French fashion giant.
